cards.name: Lesser Spinel Spellstone
cards.text: Give Undead in your hand +1/+1. (Gain (Corpse, Corpses) to upgrade.)
cards.flavorText: A story concluded, the kobolds had fought Yet here is a spellstone Azari forgot Pawned off to shops, considered a trinket Dark powers contained, none would think it

cards.name: Shambling Zombietank
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to summon a copy of this.
cards.flavorText: Spider Tank in shambles.

cards.name: Silk Stitching
cards.text: Choose a friendly minion. Discover a spell that costs (4) or less for it to cast when it dies.
cards.flavorText: The slogan of their very exclusive sewing club is "You can't stitch with us."

cards.name: Threads of Despair
cards.text: Give all minions "Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions."
cards.flavorText: Mom, I frew up...

cards.name: Rainbow Seamstress
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck started with a Blood, Frost, or Unholy card, gain Lifesteal, Reborn, or Rush respectively.
cards.flavorText: Is this card any good? It would seam sew.

cards.name: Rambunctious Stuffy
cards.text: Rush After you cast a Frost spell, gain Reborn.
cards.flavorText: The Lich King can't sleep without his stuffy.

cards.name: Toysnatching Geist
cards.text: Gigantify Battlecry: Discover an Undead. Reduce its Cost by this minion's Attack.
cards.flavorText: So THAT'S how the Geist stole Winterveil!

cards.name: Darkthorn Quilter
cards.text: At the end of your turn, deal this minion's Attack damage randomly split among enemies.
cards.flavorText: Still mad about not being let into the spiders' sewing club.

cards.name: Helm of Humiliation
cards.text: Give a minion -5/-5. Give a minion in your hand +5/+5.
cards.flavorText: <whispers> "...and your father was a Murloc too."

cards.name: Amateur Puppeteer
cards.text: Miniaturize, Taunt Deathrattle: Give Undead in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: "I'm a real toy!"

cards.name: Foamrender
cards.text: Whenever your hero attacks, spend 3 Corpses to gain +1 Durability.
cards.flavorText: No honey, we have Shadowmourne at home.

cards.name: Dr. Stitchensew
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a 5, 3, and 1-Cost minion to stitch to this. Deathrattle: Summon the 5-Cost minion.
cards.flavorText: First, do some harm.

cards.name: The Headless Horseman
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy the enemy minion with the most Attack! Shuffle my Head into your deck, you must get it back!
cards.flavorText: This flavor text, you would expect to rhyme and reference, to great effect! It starts out strong, but as you can tell it doesn't end very good.

cards.name: Red Card
cards.text: Make a minion go Dormant for 2 turns.
cards.flavorText: Finally, Demon Hunter has expanded its color palette to TWO colors!

cards.name: Sock Puppet Slitherspear
cards.text: This minion's Attack is improved by your hero's.
cards.flavorText: The right hand of Queen Azshara is Lady Vashj. This is her left hand.

cards.name: Blind Box
cards.text: Get 2 random Demons. Outcast: Discover them instead.
cards.flavorText: THREE Flame Imps?? C'mon, where's my pity timer?!

cards.name: Lesser Opal Spellstone
cards.text: Draw 1 card. (Attack with your hero (time, times) to upgrade.)
cards.flavorText: For those seeking glory and power Be not swayed by Azari the Devourer The opal grants victory to the weak But leaves your soul barren and bleak

cards.name: Spirit of the Team
cards.text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your hero has +2 Attack on your turn.
cards.flavorText: Horrible call! BOOOOoo00oO0o0OO0oo0oO!

cards.name: Return Policy
cards.text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle card you've played this game. Trigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavorText: Sorry, the Workshop has a strict 'no-takesies-backsies' policy.

cards.name: Ball Hog
cards.text: Lifesteal Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
cards.flavorText: "There's no hog in team... ANYMORE! I QUIT!"

cards.name: Ci'Cigi
cards.text: Deathrattle: Get 3 random first-edition Demon Hunter cards (in mint condition).
cards.flavorText: She once bought a 1of1 Golden Skull of Gul'dan written entirely in Thalassian for 2,000,000 Gold.

cards.name: Gibbering Reject
cards.text: After your hero attacks, summon another Gibbering Reject.
cards.flavorText: Don't get it wet or feed it after midnight.

cards.name: Umpire's Grasp
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Demon and reduce its Cost by (2).
cards.flavorText: PENALTY - FEL BALL!

cards.name: Workshop Mishap
cards.text: Deal 5 damage to a minion. Excess damages both neighbors. Outcast: Gain Lifesteal.
cards.flavorText: IT HAS BEEN DAYS SINCE LAST ACCIDENT.

cards.name: Window Shopper
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Discover a Demon. Set its stats and Cost to this minion's.
cards.flavorText: OMG THAT'S LITERALLY ME!

cards.name: Magtheridon, Unreleased
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, deal 3 damage to all enemies at the end of your turn.
cards.flavorText: Playing with this card can be penalized with up to a two-year suspension. Please wait until the card is officially released.

cards.name: Jade Display
cards.text: Deathrattle: Your Jade Displays have +1/+1 this game. Shuffle 2 of them into your deck.
cards.flavorText: The Jade Lotus just releases the same product every year but with an upgraded camera.

cards.name: Magical Dollhouse
cards.text: Gain Spell Damage +1 this turn only.
cards.flavorText: Build your own dollhouse in 3 easy steps! 1. Build a castle. 2. Miniaturize it. 3. GLITTER!

cards.name: Bottomless Toy Chest
cards.text: Discover a card from your deck. If you have Spell Damage, copy it.
cards.flavorText: That's right, it goes in the toy chest.

cards.name: Wind-Up Sapling
cards.text: Tradeable Battlecry: Refresh Mana (Crystal, Crystals). (Trade to upgrade!)
cards.flavorText: I am Wind-Up Sapling.

cards.name: Ensmallen
cards.text: Reduce the Cost and Attack of minions in your deck by (1).
cards.flavorText: Come on, you know- I ensmallen, you ensmallen? He she me Ensmallen? Ensmallogy: the study of ensmallening?! IT'S FIRST GRADE.

cards.name: Overgrown Beanstalk
cards.text: Summon a 2/2 Treant. Draw a card for each Treant you control.
cards.flavorText: You'd need to be pretty jacked to climb this.

cards.name: Snuggle Teddy
cards.text: Gigantify Elusive, Lifesteal, Taunt
cards.flavorText: Someone really put their heart into making this.

cards.name: Sparkling Phial
cards.text: Deal 2 damage. Your next card this turn costs that much less.
cards.flavorText: Lemme pull up your phial.

cards.name: Chia Drake
cards.text: Miniaturize Choose One - Gain Spell Damage +1; or Draw a spell.
cards.flavorText: Huh-huh-huh Hearthstone!

cards.name: Sky Mother Aviana
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 10 random Legendary minions into your deck. They cost (1).
cards.flavorText: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's 10 copies of Leeroy Jenkins!

cards.name: Woodland Wonders
cards.text: Summon two 2/5 Beetles with Taunt. Costs (3) less if you have Spell Damage.
cards.flavorText: Is this a standup fight or another bug hunt?

cards.name: Toyrantus
cards.text: Taunt, Elusive Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +7/+7.
cards.flavorText: Dr. Boom was definitely a dinosaur kid.

cards.name: Owlonius
cards.text: Spell Damage +1 Your spells get double bonus from Spell Damage.
cards.flavorText: They said you sound like an owl.

cards.name: Wilderness Pack
cards.text: Add 5 random Beasts to your hand. At the end of your turn, discard them.
cards.flavorText: Don't bother asking, "Can we keep them?" The answer is no.

cards.name: Bargain Bin
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, spell, or weapon, draw a card of the other 2 types.
cards.flavorText: Used to contain Worgen Greaser until SOMEONE started buffing it.

cards.name: Fetch!
cards.text: Draw a minion. If it's a Beast, draw a spell.
cards.flavorText: We made fetch happen.

cards.name: Jungle Gym
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each friendly Beast.
cards.flavorText: Yeah, I work out at the gym. The one with all the plushies and toys.

cards.name: Painted Canvasaur
cards.text: Battlecry: Give each other friendly Beast a random bonus effect.
cards.flavorText: Oh this is a present? Would you like that gift raptor not?

cards.name: Patchwork Pals
cards.text: Get all 3 Animal Companions. They cost (1) less.
cards.flavorText: "I'll name you Misha, you Huffer, and you can be the third one."

cards.name: Remote Control
cards.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Hound.
cards.flavorText: For some reason, my dog keeps trying to eat this.

cards.name: R.C. Rampage
cards.text: Summon six 1/1 Hounds. Any that can't fit give the others +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: This place has really gone to the dogs.

cards.name: Hemet, Foam Marksman
cards.text: After a friendly Beast dies, get a random Legendary Beast from the past. It costs (2) less.
cards.flavorText: So THIS is who's been lowering the power level of all those Hearthstone cards in a foamly fashion.

cards.name: Mystery Egg
cards.text: Miniaturize Deathrattle: Get a copy of a random Beast in your deck. It costs (5) less.
cards.flavorText: Which came first, the Mukla or the egg?

cards.name: Product 9
cards.text: Battlecry: Recast every friendly Secret that triggered this game.
cards.flavorText: We're fresh out of Toyrantus right now but lemme show you something we have that's just as good!

cards.name: Toyrannosaurus
cards.text: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavorText: This toy WRECKS.

cards.name: King Plush
cards.text: Charge Battlecry: Return all minions with less Attack than this to their owner's decks.
cards.flavorText: He's so fluffy you're gonna DIE!

cards.name: Hidden Objects
cards.text: Discover a Secret. Set its Cost to (1).
cards.flavorText: There are 99 gnomes in this picture. Can YOU find them all?

cards.name: Malfunction
cards.text: Deal 3 damage split among all enemy minions. If your deck has no minions, deal 3 more.
cards.flavorText: Bug Report: This card works perfectly.

cards.name: Buy One, Get One Freeze
cards.text: Freeze a minion. Summon a Frozen copy of it.
cards.flavorText: That's an ice deal!

cards.name: Darkmoon Magician
cards.text: Elusive After you cast a spell, cast a random spell that costs (1) more.
cards.flavorText: Darkmoon Magicians pull rabbits out of their hats, and wins out of their... hats.

cards.name: Frost Lich Cross-Stitch
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to a character. If it dies, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental that Freezes.
cards.flavorText: Do not fear power... Fear those who SEW IT!

cards.name: Spot the Difference
cards.text: Discover a 3-Cost minion to summon. If your deck has no minions, repeat this.
cards.flavorText: Ah, I see now! One of them is a picture of a Chillwind Yeti, and the other is a Blood Elf.

cards.name: Triplewick Trickster
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy, three times.
cards.flavorText: You no take candle! Or second candle. You can take third candle though.

cards.name: Watercolor Artist
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Frost spell. At the start of your turns, reduce its Cost by (1).
cards.flavorText: They've amassed a largely aquatic body of work, painting lakes, rivers and self portraits.

cards.name: Manufacturing Error
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. If your deck has no minions, they cost (3) less.
cards.flavorText: You thought the 9-piece puzzle would be easy, didn't you?

cards.name: Sleet Skater
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Gain Armor equal to its Attack.
cards.flavorText: How do you do, fellow Ice Elementals?

cards.name: Puzzlemaster Khadgar
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip a 0/6 Wisdomball that casts helpful Mage spells!
cards.flavorText: Khadgar Khadgar in the ball, who is the smartest white-haired, tall, handsome mage of them all?

cards.name: Yogg in the Box
cards.text: Cast 5 random spells. If your deck has no minions, the spells cast cost (5) or more.
cards.flavorText: POP! Goes the Old God!

cards.name: The Galactic Projection Orb
cards.text: Recast a random spell of each Cost you've cast this game (targets enemies if possible).
cards.flavorText: Look closely in the ball and you'll see the expansion of space and time itself. Or their projections, anyway.

cards.name: Fancy Packaging
cards.text: Give a minion with Divine Shield +2/+3.
cards.flavorText: Wow, this card is great value! Until you open it.

cards.name: Whack-A-Gnoll
cards.text: Discover a Paladin weapon from the past. Give it +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: Need closure on your Hardcore WoW character dying in Westfall? Step right up!

cards.name: Flickering Lightbot
cards.text: Gigantify Costs (1) less for each Holy spell you've cast this game.
cards.flavorText: These bots are sent out with nearly drained batteries, for dramatic effect.

cards.name: Trinket Artist
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine Shield minion and an Aura.
cards.flavorText: Many Draenei found new hobbies on the long journey from Argus.

cards.name: Cardboard Golem
cards.text: Battlecry: Increase the duration of Auras in your hand, deck, and battlefield by 1.
cards.flavorText: It's certainly... creative.

cards.name: Flash Sale
cards.text: Summon a 1/2 Mech with Divine Shield and Taunt. Give your minions +1/+2.
cards.flavorText: HOW LOW! HOW LOW! HOW LOW!

cards.name: Holy Glowsticks
cards.text: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage. Costs (1) if you've cast a Holy spell this turn.
cards.flavorText: Somewhere there's a Naaru missing a couple of shards.

cards.name: Painter's Virtue
cards.text: Lifesteal After your hero attacks, give minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: For when the Light hits the painting at a certain angle.

cards.name: Tigress Plushy
cards.text: Miniaturize Rush, Lifesteal, Divine Shield
cards.flavorText: The sheervalue of this card is undeniable.

cards.name: Toy Captain Tarim
cards.text: Miniaturize Taunt. Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to this minion's.
cards.flavorText: Whizbang is now the sole proprietor of Un'Goro.

cards.name: Wind-Up Enforcer
cards.text: Tradeable Battlecry: Summon (copy, copies) of this minion. (Trade to upgrade!)
cards.flavorText: Code 6404.5 clearly states that all Enforcers remain in their packaging until told by authorized personnel.

cards.name: Crafter's Aura
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random 6-Cost minion. Lasts turns.
cards.flavorText: She has at LEAST Craftsmanship +3.

cards.name: Pipsi Painthoof
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Divine Shield, Rush, and Taunt minion from your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Earthmother guide my paintbrush strokes, especially on the eyes."

cards.name: Papercraft Angel
cards.text: Your Hero Power costs (0).
cards.flavorText: Warcraft. StarCraft. And now, Papercraft!

cards.name: Purifying Power
cards.text: Silence all friendly minions, then give them +1/+2.
cards.flavorText: I sure do love making my minions better!

cards.name: Scale Replica
cards.text: Draw your lowest and highest Cost Dragon.
cards.flavorText: Get it!?! It's because dragons have hides - commonly known as scales - and this is a model of a dragon on a smaller level, also known as a scale. IT'S THE SAME WORD!

cards.name: Careless Crafter
cards.text: Deathrattle: Get two 0-Cost Bandages that restore 3 Health.
cards.flavorText: How about YOU try folding paper with only three fingers!?

cards.name: Fly Off the Shelves
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Repeat for each Dragon you're holding.
cards.flavorText: No, Whizbang, you can't pass off a poorly made shelf as a cool Priest spell.

cards.name: Funhouse Mirror
cards.text: Summon a copy of an enemy minion. It attacks the original.
cards.flavorText: Funhouse mirror on the wall, Who's the tallest gnome of all?

cards.name: Chalk Artist
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform it into a random Legendary one (keeping its original stats and Cost).
cards.flavorText: Well it's either a dragon or a dinosaur - chalk it up to art style.

cards.name: Delayed Product
cards.text: Discover and summon a minion that costs (8) or more. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
cards.flavorText: Soon (TM).

cards.name: Puppet Theatre
cards.text: Choose an enemy minion. Get a 1/1 copy of it that costs (1).
cards.flavorText: AUDIENCE PARTICIPATION TIME!

cards.name: Raza the Resealed
cards.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Hero Power refreshes whenever you play a card.
cards.flavorText: The 10th anniversary edition of a classic bestseller!

cards.name: Timewinder Zarimi
cards.text: Battlecry: Once per game, if you've summoned 8 other Dragons, take an extra turn. ( left!) (Ready!)
cards.flavorText: With how generous Whizbang's return policy is, Zarimi has never been busier.

cards.name: Clay Matriarch
cards.text: Miniaturize Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Whelp with Elusive.
cards.flavorText: I hope you didn't need all that purple clay.

cards.name: Repackage
cards.text: Stuff all minions into a 2-Cost Box, then shuffle it into the opponent's deck.
cards.flavorText: I don't want to play with you anymore.

cards.name: Dig for Treasure
cards.text: Draw a minion. If it's a Pirate, get a Coin.
cards.flavorText: "Woohoo! I'm so glad I dug up a pirate!"

cards.name: Twisted Pack
cards.text: Add 5 random cards from other classes to your hand. At the end of your turn, discard them.
cards.flavorText: Twist it! Rip it! Play it!

cards.name: Thistle Tea Set
cards.text: Discover a spell from another class. Get a copy of it.
cards.flavorText: Available with Swiftthistle or Decafthistle.

cards.name: Toy Boat
cards.text: After you summon a Pirate, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Try playing seven of these in one turn fast.

cards.name: Bargain Bin Buccaneer
cards.text: Rush Combo: Summon a copy of this.
cards.flavorText: Thrift stores have the best buccaneers.

cards.name: Dust Bunny
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random piece of junk to your hand (a Coin, Rock, Banana, or Knife).
cards.flavorText: Worth its weight in Dust.

cards.name: The Crystal Cove
cards.text: The next minion you summon this turn has its stats set to 5/5.
cards.flavorText: For some strange reason, everyone that hangs out at the Crystal Cove has the same name...

cards.name: Dubious Purchase
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. Combo: Destroy a random enemy minion.
cards.flavorText: Beauty is in the eye of the scorpidholder.

cards.name: Sonya Waterdancer
cards.text: After you play a 1-Cost card, get a copy of it that costs (0).
cards.flavorText: Water you dancing to?

cards.name: Watercannon
cards.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate that attacks a random enemy.
cards.flavorText: There's a teeny tiny pirate trapped in each of the water balloons. Free them!

cards.name: Sandbox Scoundrel
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next card this turn costs (3) less.
cards.flavorText: "Really? A bunch of fake plastic gems AGAIN!?"

cards.name: Shoplifter Goldbeard
cards.text: After you summon a Pirate, summon a copy of it that attacks a random enemy, then dies.
cards.flavorText: "Arr, this plunder be great for Cap'n Fourteeth's baby shower!"

cards.name: Everything Must Go!
cards.text: Summon two random 4-Cost minions. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
cards.flavorText: Go where??

cards.name: Murloc Growfin
cards.text: Gigantify Battlecry: Summon a Tinyfin with Rush and stats equal to this minion's.
cards.flavorText: Grows up to 8x its size! Just add water!

cards.name: Pop-Up Book
cards.text: Deal 2 damage. Summon two 0/1 Frogs with Taunt.
cards.flavorText: What's up-book?

cards.name: Fairy Tale Forest
cards.text: Draw a Battlecry minion. It costs (1) less.
cards.flavorText: Man, I wish fairy tales were real, Durg'tash the Sorcerer.

cards.name: Incredible Value
cards.text: Discover a 4-Cost minion. Set its Attack and Health to 7.
cards.flavorText: Now with expedited Overload!

cards.name: Baking Soda Volcano
cards.text: Lifesteal. Deal 10 damage randomly split among all minions. Overload: (1)
cards.flavorText: Science rules.

cards.name: Hagatha the Fabled
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw 2 spells that cost (5) or more. Transform them into Slimes that cast the spells.
cards.flavorText: Soup's on!

cards.name: Sand Art Elemental
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Give your hero +1 Attack and Windfury this turn.
cards.flavorText: This art HURT ME!!!

cards.name: Rocket Hopper
cards.text: Rush Overload: (4)
cards.flavorText: Are y'all gonna ask for THIS one to be orange too!?

cards.name: Wave of Nostalgia
cards.text: Transform ALL minions into random Legendary ones from the past.
cards.flavorText: Ja, please don't freeze my minions. No stall, ja????

cards.name: Once Upon a Time...
cards.text: Summon a random 3-Cost Beast, Dragon, Elemental, and Murloc.
cards.flavorText: ...There was a humble little squirrel on a quest to defeat an evil dragon. With the help of its earthen friend, it saved the murloc princess from danger. The end.

cards.name: Shudderblock
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next Battlecry triggers 3 times, but can't damage the enemy hero.
cards.flavorText: Beware the hinges that pinch, the scales that splinter!

cards.name: Shining Sentinel
cards.text: Taunt, Elusive Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
cards.flavorText: OMG, I FINALLY GOT A SHINING SENTINEL AFTER 3 PHASES AND 8192 RESETS!!!!!

cards.name: Wish Upon a Star
cards.text: Give +2/+3 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
cards.flavorText: "What are you going to wish for?" "I wish I had just a liiiiiiiittle more Attack and Health!" "...Really? You don't want, like, a million more?"

cards.name: Mass Production
cards.text: Draw 2 cards. Deal 3 damage to your hero. Shuffle 2 copies of this into your deck.
cards.flavorText: Whenever you cast this, we make a new Nemsy portrait.

cards.name: Endgame
cards.text: Resurrect your last Demon that died.

cards.name: Cursed Campaign
cards.text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon two copies of this minion that are Dormant for 2 turns."
cards.flavorText: Their group has been trying to schedule the next session since Kobolds and Catacombs came out.

cards.name: Domino Effect
cards.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Repeat to the left or right, dealing 1 more damage each time.
cards.flavorText: WHY DO THEY NEVER RUN TO THE SIDE?????

cards.name: Malefic Rook
cards.text: Battlecry: Attack YOUR hero.
cards.flavorText: Was a regular Pawn but Fel in with the wrong toys.

cards.name: Sketch Artist
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Shadow spell. Get a temporary copy of it.
cards.flavorText: Never ask an artist how many pieces they've finished.

cards.name: INFERNAL!
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Set your hero's remaining Health to 15.
cards.flavorText: FLAVOR TEXT!

cards.name: Tabletop Roleplayer
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
cards.flavorText: "And then I uh... I curse them with... uh... OH! I got it! They have to speak in rhymes or they turn into a crab!"

cards.name: Game Master Nemsy
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Demon. Deathrattle: Swap places with it.
cards.flavorText: "Rocks fall, and everyone dies. Oopsies!"

cards.name: Crane Game
cards.text: Summon copies of two Demons in your deck.
cards.flavorText: This claw machine is RIGGED! I keep getting demons that bite me!

cards.name: Wheel of DEATH!!!
cards.text: Destroy your deck. In 5 turns, destroy the enemy hero.
cards.flavorText: Why don't the good guys ever get a wheel?

cards.name: Wretched Queen
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 4/6 Knights with Taunt.
cards.flavorText: Mind your head when you're around her.

cards.name: Table Flip
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions. Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
cards.flavorText: "Judge!"

cards.name: Standardized Pack
cards.text: Add 5 random Taunt minions to your hand. At the end of your turn, discard them.
cards.flavorText: TAUNT. TAUNT. TAUNT. TAUNT. TAUNT.

cards.name: Part Scrapper
cards.text: Lose up to 5 Armor. Your next Mech costs that much less.
cards.flavorText: "Goodbye! Goodbye! Goodbye!"

cards.name: Quality Assurance
cards.text: Draw 2 Taunt minions.
cards.flavorText: I assure you this card is quality.

cards.name: Safety Goggles
cards.text: Gain 6 Armor. Costs (0) if you don't have any Armor.
cards.flavorText: Remember, always be safe in the lab to mitigate injuries! *painfully snaps goggles onto face*

cards.name: Wreck'em and Deck'em
cards.text: Choose a friendly Mech. Summon a copy of it that attacks a random enemy, then dies.
cards.flavorText: ...and Check'em for any signs of life.

cards.name: Boom Wrench
cards.text: Miniaturize Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly Mech.
cards.flavorText: Boom, the Inventor; Can he fix it? Boom, the Inventor; No he can't!

cards.name: Lab Patron
cards.text: The first time you gain Armor each turn, summon another Lab Patron.
cards.flavorText: When a Lab Patron fails out of school, they become a Grim Patron.

cards.name: Chemical Spill
cards.text: Summon the highest Cost minion from your hand, then deal 5 damage to it.
cards.flavorText: I said spill the TEA, not the acid!

cards.name: Fireworker
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
cards.flavorText: The one job where a spark of creativity is unwanted.

cards.name: Testing Dummy
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavorText: Don't worry, they're having a blast. MUAHAHAHAHAAAA!

cards.name: Inventor Boom
cards.text: Battlecry: Resurrect two friendly Mechs that cost (5) or more. They immediately attack random enemies.
cards.flavorText: The best part of inventing stuff is blowing it up!

cards.name: Botface
cards.text: Taunt After this takes damage, get two random Minis.
cards.flavorText: "NOBODY CALLS ME BOTFACE!!" -Botface

cards.name: Safety Expert
cards.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Shuffle three Bombs into your opponent's deck.
cards.flavorText: Remember: Always wear your helmet when strapped to a bajillion explosives.

cards.name: Zilliax Deluxe 3000
cards.text: While building your deck, customize your very own Zilliax Deluxe 3000!
cards.flavorText: It only took us 2998 prototypes to figure out how to make the perfect card... by having YOU do it!

cards.name: Corridor Sleeper
cards.text: Starts Dormant. After 7 minions die, awaken.
cards.flavorText: In the workshop, I go deeper. In the mulligan, I'm a keeper. This time, I'm even cheaper. You guessed it right, I'm Corridor Sleeper.

cards.name: Giftwrapped Whelp
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, give it and this minion +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: Don't forget to poke fire-breathing holes in the box!

cards.name: Scarab Keychain
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a 2-Cost card.
cards.flavorText: "How do you keep losing your keys!? They couldn't have just gotten up and walked away!"

cards.name: Tar Slime
cards.text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
cards.flavorText: Too cute to be contained!

cards.name: Treasure Distributor
cards.text: After you summon a Pirate, give it and this minion +1 Attack.
cards.flavorText: As the illiterate pirates always say: There is no 'I' in 'piracy'.

cards.name: Pro Gamer
cards.text: Battlecry: Challenge your opponent to a game of Rock-Paper-Scissors! The winner draws 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: Wow... who could have guessed? Another rock user ruining the meta for everyone as usual.

cards.name: Sing-Along Buddy
cards.text: Your Hero Power triggers twice.
cards.flavorText: One of the buttons makes you sound JUST like Ragnaros. BY FIRE BE HEARD!

cards.name: Bucket of Soldiers
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Soldiers with random bonus effects.
cards.flavorText: Life is like a bucket of soldiers. You never know what bonus effects you're gonna get.

cards.name: Card Grader
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, Discover a card from your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Uncentered gem, fractured frame, folded corner... 10/10!"

cards.name: Clearance Promoter
cards.text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of two spells in your hand by (1).
cards.flavorText: "Sorry, we just sold our last Worgen Greaser figure."

cards.name: Cosplay Contestant
cards.text: After your opponent plays a minion, transform into a 3/4 copy of it.
cards.flavorText: She's the winner of the Valeera Cosplay Contest! Second place was Valeera.

cards.name: Explodineer
cards.text: At the end of your turn, shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
cards.flavorText: Explodineeeer... explodifaaaar... explode whereeeever you aaaaare...

cards.name: Floppy Hydra
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanently doubled Attack and Health.
cards.flavorText: If you cut one of its heads off, it'll grow back twice as cute!

cards.name: Messmaker
cards.text: Lifesteal, Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
cards.flavorText: The most painful 1 damage of your life.

cards.name: Nostalgic Initiate
cards.text: Miniaturize The first time you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: Nostalgic Initiate: "Man I wish I could relive my college days..." Kel'thuzad: "Say no more."

cards.name: Observer of Mysteries
cards.text: Battlecry: Cast 2 random Secrets. At the start of your turn, destroy them.
cards.flavorText: Nobody tell him, but he still has his Secrets set to the "Try Me" mode.

cards.name: Plucky Paintfin
cards.text: Poisonous Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion.
cards.flavorText: Not everyone can become a great painter. But a great painter can come from anywhere.

cards.name: Rumble Enthusiast
cards.text: After you play the left- or right-most card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavorText: There's always room for one more game in the tavern!

cards.name: Sweetened Snowflurry
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Get 2 random temporary Frost spells.
cards.flavorText: "You want a piece of me!? Will that be one scoop or two?"

cards.name: Caricature Artist
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a minion that costs (5) or more. Give it a funny mustache!
cards.flavorText: "Pfffftâ¦. You look RIDICULOUS! And I haven't even drawn the mustache yet!"

cards.name: Giggling Toymaker
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavorText: "HAHAhehehe. Hahaha he." -Me when I'm making toys

cards.name: Nesting Golem
cards.text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
cards.flavorText: NESTING GOLEEEEEEEEEEEEM!!!!!!! Ehâ¦ It just doesn't feel the same.

cards.name: Nostalgic Gnome
cards.text: Miniaturize Rush. After this minion deals exact lethal damage on your turn, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: She remembers Alterac Valley like it was 833 days ago.

cards.name: Origami Crane
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
cards.flavorText: I was born with 1-Health and paper skin.

cards.name: Puppetmaster Dorian
cards.text: After you draw a minion, get a 1/1 copy of it that costs (1).
cards.flavorText: Though Dorian may officially be working under Dr. Boom, we all know who's really pulling the strings...

cards.name: Splendiferous Whizbang
cards.text: You start the game with one of Whizbang's Experimental Decks!
cards.flavorText: After his work at Boomsday Labs, he's taken what Dr. Boom taught him and applied it to the most important inventions of all - TOYS!!!

cards.name: Building-Block Golem
cards.text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon three random 1-Cost minions.
cards.flavorText: I HOPE YOU STEP ON A 1-COST MINION!

cards.name: Forgotten Animatronic
cards.text: At the end of your turn, destroy a minion with less Attack than this.
cards.flavorText: He ALWAYS comes back.

cards.name: Nostalgic Clown
cards.text: Miniaturize Battlecry: If you've played a higher Cost card while holding this, deal 4 damage.
cards.flavorText: He used to be kind of corrupt, but now he performs purely for the fun of it.

cards.name: Origami Frog
cards.text: Rush Battlecry: Swap Attack with another minion.
cards.flavorText: For extra-realistic fly-snatching action, use tape!

cards.name: The Replicator-inator
cards.text: Miniaturize, Gigantify After you play a minion with the same Attack as this, summon a copy of it.
cards.flavorText: Dr. Boom is the greatest inventor in the Tri-Zone area!

cards.name: Workshop Janitor
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a location, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: She works in a magical toy shop and they just gave her a regular mop? Make it make sense.

cards.name: Li'Na, Shop Manager
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, fill your board with random minions of that Cost.
cards.flavorText: Somebody has to do the paperwork around here.

cards.name: Origami Dragon
cards.text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal Battlecry: Swap stats with another minion.
cards.flavorText: The fire will give you a papercut, which CAN burn. Does that count?

cards.name: Wind-Up Musician
cards.text: Tradeable Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions. (Trade to upgrade!)
cards.flavorText: Sure to wind up your opponents.

cards.name: Colifero the Artist
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform all other friendly minions into copies of it.
cards.flavorText: You are what you paint! And Colifero is paint.

cards.name: Joymancer Jepetto
cards.text: Battlecry: Get copies of every 1-Attack or 1-Health minion you've played this game.
cards.flavorText: Joymancy (noun): The practice of bringing joy to others through the use of magic. (see also: ethics)

cards.name: Factory Assemblybot
cards.text: Miniaturize At the end of your turn, summon a 6/7 Bot that attacks a random enemy.
cards.flavorText: I call it Mini-me.

cards.name: Playhouse Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this game.
cards.flavorText: WARNING: NOT A PLAYHOUSE. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CLIMB.
